Text:
Having completed Lambda's task and grasping how to
manipulate magic, Number 666 gradually begins to
stand out from the other trainees.

(I managed to keep up again today... I'm improving,
bit by bit.)

(I need to prove myself, and quickly. That will open
the way for me.)

(...Time is of the essence. I must get them to
recognize my skills as quickly as I can, before
Oriana is completely lost...)
Hey, Number 666. Clean out your ears!
Y-Yes, ma'am! How can I serve?!

You've been looking pretty good out there lately.
Maybe you're finding it so easy you think it's okay
to daydream?
N-No, ma'am, I'm sorry...

I have something special planned for you tomorrow.
Be ready.
Th-Thank you! May as I ask what it is...?

Simple. You'll be facing someone more skilled than
usual. And you better believe you won't have any
time for stray thoughts!
Yes, ma'am! I'll be prepared!

The next day, Number 666 is set to spar with an
opponent hand-picked for her by Lambda.

Neither excited nor apprehensive, she merely waits
quietly for the moment to arrive.

Now, let us commence Number 666's special training.
...Nu!
Yes, I'm here.
(But when did she get here...?! So she's Nu...)

Go a round with 666 here. And no mercy or going easy
just because you're both humans.

Understood... I look forward to facing you today,
Number 666.
Likewise, thank you for the opportunity!
And thus Number 666's special lesson begins...
Heh...!
...Urgh!

(I knew she would be strong...but to this extent!
This fight couldn't be more one-sided...)

(Nevertheless, my own swordplay and magic aren't too
inferior to hers. I can still win if I can just find an opening
to exploit!)

(Besides, I have a reason not to lose! I must take
back the Kingdom of Oriana!)
Haaah!!!
...Weak.

With a flash of her blade, Nu causes Number 666
to lose her form.
The tip of Nu's sword points at Rose's throat.
...Your loss.
Enough!
Wait, please! Let us go another round...!
I don't mind, but...
...Keep at it 'til you're satisfied.

Number 666 proceeded to challenge Nu until she had no
more strength in her, but in the end she lost every
round.
Urgh...! I lost...utterly and completely...
(She doesn't even look flushed...)
Thank you, Nu. As for you, Number 666...
Y-Yes, ma'am!
Why did you join the Shadow Garden?

I thought I told you to throw everything away!
So tell me, just what have you rid yourself of?!

We are all here because we have staked everything on
our fight! If you think this is some game, then get out of
my sight, now!
Ahh...

Number 666 is filled with chagrin, but she has no
words to say in the face of such a pitiful outcome.
